summary: After spending seven years in jail for an art heist, Frenchman Victor Lambert returns to Moscow to uncover the circumstances behind his son Jeremy's brutal murder. He is backed by his lover... See full summary »
cast: Gérard Depardieu|Elizabeth Hurley|Evgeniya Akhremenko|Andrey Da!|Eli Danker|Frédéric Ducastel|Jean Baptiste Fillon|Marika Gvilava|Denis Karasyov|Polina Kuzminskaya|Solenn Mariani|Marcello Mazzarella|Aleksey Petrenko|Kait Tenison|Maria Vinogray
title: Viktor
